channel.title: Gamers update - a mmorpg news letter
channel.description:
hi guys!
Well this is the first ever preview of a new's letter that i will be emailing out or posting every few weeks updating everyone on whats going on in the MMORPG world. The image bellow is just a *sample* of what i hope to offer you guys in which the real thing shall contains links and much more info.
I hope you like it and please please post any constructive thoughts you have on it here. I spent quite a while getting it together and i would much like to continue its construction with a positive idea of purpose (so you guys like). If anyone would like the new versions of the newsletter emailed to them just post your email adress.
thx for looking.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/421/newsletter5oc.jpg[/img][/U

item.title: Gamers update - a mmorpg news letter
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

hehe, ye i hate runescape to…world of warcraft ownz, i think runescape appeals to the people on most of the forums that i go on so i may add lil bit on the end of each of the news letter’s about runescape.

item.title: Gamers update - a mmorpg news letter
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Pretty cool, but if your posting this on any large mmo forums, your going to get flamed for having runescape news. Almost everyone hates runescape on other MMO forums.

Read full topic
